bug.author: Jerryzhangzhao
bug.summary: the code seems works well with '.jpg' images but not '.JPG'
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Issue summary</denchmark-h>
my system is win7 x64, the code seems works well with '.jpg' images but not '.JPG' ,is there something I used not correctly or it is just what it is.

comments.comment: Good catch! I did it now case insensitive. Let me know if it still fails. Thanks!
